dict.acceptation: 轻松，舒适；容易；安逸；不拘束，自在；
解除痛苦；减轻；延缓；松弛；

sent.orig: It also organizes programs to help foreign students feel more at Ease ease their new surroundings.
sent.trans: 他们也会组织活动来帮助留学生缓减因新环境而带来的紧张（情绪）。

sent.orig: You can ease back(ease back on) the stick and gain a little height.
sent.trans: 你可以把操纵杆向后拉一拉，让飞机飞高一些。

sent.orig: The tango pack has another advantage:ease of unpacking is match by ease of re - packing.
sent.trans: 另一优点在于重新包装同拆卸一样易如反掌。

sent.orig: Without you. Like me. Is very at ease at ease.
sent.trans: 失去你。我一样。很安心很安心。

sent.orig: The election of a relatively young Albertan as prime minister should help ease western alienation.
sent.trans: 一个年纪不是很大的亚伯达人当选为总理，这将有助于缓解加拿大东部和西部之间的矛盾。
